metadata.title: CVE-2018-14360 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in NeoMutt before 2018-07-16. nntp_add_group innewsrc.c has a stack-based buffer overflow because of incorrect sscanfusage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

neomutt - 20180716+dfsg.1-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: neomutt package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180716+dfsg.1-1.2').
